name: Austin Recycles
description: Application and web service that provides trash and recycling pickup information for the City of Austin.

name: Austin Restaurant Scores
description: App to query Austin restaurant scores

name: Bike Buddy
description: Connecting people who want to try bicycle commuting with experienced bicycle commuters who want to help. A May 2013 Austin Bike Month initiative. Created as a public service by Open Austin.

name: Hack Task Aggregator
description: Web application to aggregate tasks across projects that are identified for "hacking".

name: LIVES
description: Generate LIVES standard data feed from restaurant inspection scores in Austin, TX.

name: TEC Filer
description: A system for filing campaign finance reports required by the Texas Ethics Commission. Open source and can be deployed anywhere in Texas.

name: Vote ATX
description: The Vote ATX application finds voting places based on a user's location.
